creator: ifm electronic gmbh
descriptionHtml:
With the ifm moneo | blue mobile app you can connect wirelessly to ifm IO-Link masters (FW> V2.1) via the ifm inline and multi-bluetooth adapter (E30446 and EIO330), IO-Link process data, Read diagnostic events and device information from each IO-Link device.
Important: This process needs an IODD file to be downloaded from IODD Server and need to be stored.

You communicate with the IO-Link devices without the need for a PLC. You can parameterize the IO-Link devices together with the EIO330. Wizard-guided and graphically supported parameterization of special ifm sensors (TCC, MVQ101, TN2105, LR2xxx and others) expand the range. Cross-manufacturer parameterization of IO-Link devices is possible, as well as the display and recording of process data.
title: moneo|blue

creator: ifm electronic gmbh
descriptionHtml:
With the ifm moneo | blue mobile app you can connect wirelessly to ifm IO-Link masters (FW> V2.1) via the ifm inline and multi-bluetooth adapter (E30446 and EIO330), IO-Link process data, Read diagnostic events and device information from each IO-Link device.

********************************
Important: This process needs device specific IODD file (format - .xml) which can be imported manually from phone external storage to support backward compatibility of IO-Link version 1.0 and in case the phone is offline, else they get automatically downloaded from IODD finder server.
********************************

You communicate with the IO-Link devices without the need for a PLC. You can parameterize the IO-Link devices together with the EIO330. Wizard-guided and graphically supported parameterization of special ifm sensors (TCC, MVQ101, TN2105, LR2xxx and others) expand the range. Cross-manufacturer parameterization of IO-Link devices is possible, as well as the display and recording of process data.

moneo|blue also supports the devices which are in development phase and whose IODD file has not been uploaded on IODD Finder Server by importing the IODD file from phone external storage.

Wizard-guided and graphically supported parameterization of special ifm sensors (TCC, MVQ101, TN2105, LR2xxx and others) expand the range. Cross-manufacturer parameterization of IO-Link devices is possible, as well as the display and recording of process data.

moneo|blue also supports the devices which are in development phase and whose IODD file has not been uploaded on IODD Finder Server by importing the IODD file from phone external storage.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Bug Fixes
- DTI(RFID) Sensor Manual Read & Write Data is functional now.
- Generic PDOut Functionality to change PDout Data of any sensor.
- Visual Signal Strength of ifm Bluetooth Adapter on scanning screen.

title: moneo|blue

creator: ifm electronic gmbh
descriptionHtml:
With the ifm moneo | blue mobile app you can connect wirelessly to ifm IO-Link masters (FW> V2.1) via the ifm inline and multi-bluetooth adapter (E30446 and EIO330), IO-Link process data, Read diagnostic events and device information from each IO-Link device.

Wizard-guided and graphically supported parameterization of special ifm sensors (TCC, MVQ101, TN2105, LR2xxx and others) expand the range. moneo|blue also supports the devices which are in development phase and whose IODD file has not been uploaded on IODD Finder Server by importing the IODD file from phone external storage.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Implemented Bluetooth Mesh Functionality
- Supporting now ifm Base Station & ifm Mesh Adapter
- Now able to provision and un-provision the Mesh Adapter with Base Station
- Connect to Base Station and get an glance of 50 IO-Link sensor process values & configure basic attribute of Base Station
- App can now able to parametrize 50 io-link sensor by connecting to Base Station
- App can now parametrize single sensors
- Bug fixes for ifm Multi & Inline Adapter Feature

title: moneo|blue

creator: ifm electronic gmbh

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Optimization for Cockpit and Parametrization screens
* Cache mechanism implemented i.e. when you go to cockpit screen second time without disconnecting any ifm Bluetooth Adapter
* Support Request are resolved
* User Acceptance Test findings are resolved
* Support for MK5xxx sensor graphically
* MQTT parameter can be parametrized for Base Station
* Bluetooth Mesh Functionality improvements
* User are able to update the firmware

title: moneo|blue

creator: ifm electronic gmbh
descriptionHtml:
With the ifm moneo | blue mobile app you can connect wirelessly to ifm IO-Link masters (FW> V2.1) via the ifm inline and multi-bluetooth adapter (E30446 and EIO330), IO-Link process data, Read diagnostic events and device information from each IO-Link device.

********************************
Important: This process needs device specific IODD file (format - .xml) which can be imported manually from phone external storage to support backward compatibility of IO-Link version 1.0 and in case the phone is offline, else they get automatically downloaded from IODD finder server.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Feature

* Support DataStorage feature of IO-Link devices
* User are able to update the firmware of Base Station and Mesh Adapter

Bug Fixes

* Optimization for Cockpit and Parametrization screens
* Cache mechanism implemented to improve speed of displaying the parameter screens
* Improve support for MK5xxx sensor graphically
* MQTT parameter can be parametrized for Base Station
